divs: Sighting Detailsi went outside for a smoke in morning. i was looking up in sky and i saw a bright ball. go from very low altitude speeding above clouds diagnaly. right after i felt like i got knocked by my head i almost fell down. and when i looked up at that area many tiny tiny dots of ball was everywhere. there were tiny balls moving all over place with some with inner black dots those once moved in a straight path. i felt like i was sleeping or i was drugged. i was amazed by all the colors going everywhere. after about a minute i came back to my mind and started looking around for it but it was gone. if anybody saw this please email me. dannyjahanfard@gmail.com those lights around my head all around me was very intrancing.
Summary: Bright ball went very fast through clouds. brighter than lightning.
